title: Napfenyes Restaurant and Pastry Shop
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Bakery, Hungarian
description: Napfenyes Etterem es Cukraszda is all vegan, no longer using honey as reported by owner Jan 2016. In March 2015 Napfenyes Etterem's main dining service moved into this space; and the former location at Rozsa u 39 converted to a bistro. Its extensive menu is vegan and features a variety of meals along with with Hungarian specialties. Kitchen closes at 10pm. Near metro Ferenciek tere on M3 (blue).
